startLocation.address: Plaça de la Reina, 2, 07012 Palma, Illes Balears, Spain

name: The Caves of Drach Experience
summary: Discover the magical underground world of Mallorca's famous caves
description:
Experience the breathtaking beauty of the Coves del Drach, one of Mallorca's most famous natural attractions. This tour takes you through stunning limestone caves, crystal-clear underground lakes, and includes a classical music concert on a boat.
Learn about the geological formation of the caves, explore the impressive stalactites and stalagmites, and enjoy the unique atmosphere of this natural wonder.

startLocation.address: Plaça Constitució, 1, 07100 Sóller, Illes Balears, Spain

name: The Tramuntana Mountain Tour
summary: Explore the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Serra de Tramuntana
description:
Discover the stunning Serra de Tramuntana mountain range, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. This tour takes you through ancient stone paths, olive groves, and traditional mountain villages.
Visit historic monasteries, learn about traditional farming methods, and enjoy breathtaking views of the Mediterranean Sea from the island's highest peaks.

startLocation.address: Plaça de la Constitució, 1, 07400 Alcúdia, Illes Balears, Spain

name: The Roman Ruins Tour
summary: Discover Mallorca's rich Roman history and archaeological sites
description:
Explore the fascinating Roman ruins of Pollentia, one of the most important archaeological sites in Mallorca. Learn about the island's Roman past, visit the ancient theater, and discover the remains of the Roman city.
Experience the blend of Roman and modern Mallorcan culture, and enjoy the beautiful surroundings of Alcúdia's old town.

startLocation.address: Plaça Ramon Llull, 1, 07500 Manacor, Illes Balears, Spain

name: The Pearl Factory Tour
summary: Visit the famous Majorica pearl factory and learn about pearl making
description:
Discover the art of pearl making at the Majorica factory in Manacor. Learn about the history of pearl production in Mallorca, see the manufacturing process, and shop for authentic Majorica pearls.
Experience the blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern technology, and take home a piece of Mallorca's famous pearl heritage.

startLocation.address: Plaça de la Reina, 2, 07012 Palma, Illes Balears, Spain

name: The Cathedral & Old Town Tour
summary: Explore Palma's historic center and its magnificent cathedral
description:
Discover the rich history and architecture of Palma de Mallorca. Visit the stunning La Seu Cathedral, explore the Arab Baths, and stroll through the charming streets of the old town.
Learn about the city's diverse cultural heritage, from Roman times to the present day, and enjoy the vibrant atmosphere of Palma's historic center.

startLocation.address: Passeig Marítim, 1, 07470 Port de Pollença, Illes Balears, Spain

name: The Formentor Peninsula Tour
summary: Experience the stunning beauty of the Formentor Peninsula
description:
Discover the breathtaking Formentor Peninsula, one of Mallorca's most beautiful natural areas. Enjoy stunning coastal views, visit the famous Formentor Lighthouse, and explore hidden beaches.
Experience the perfect blend of natural beauty and luxury at the Formentor Hotel, and enjoy the best views of the Mediterranean Sea.

startLocation.address: Plaça de l'Ajuntament, 1, 07350 Binissalem, Illes Balears, Spain

name: The Wine & Olive Tour
summary: Discover Mallorca's finest wines and olive oils
description:
Experience the rich flavors of Mallorca's wine and olive oil production. Visit traditional wineries and olive mills, learn about the production process, and taste the finest local products.
Enjoy wine tastings, olive oil sampling, and traditional Mallorcan cuisine. Perfect for food and wine enthusiasts.

startLocation.address: Passeig de la Mar, 1, 07108 Port de Sóller, Illes Balears, Spain

name: The Vintage Train Experience
summary: Ride the historic wooden train from Palma to Sóller
description:
Experience a journey back in time on the historic wooden train from Palma to Sóller. Enjoy the scenic route through orange groves and mountains, and discover the charming town of Sóller.
Visit the beautiful Port de Sóller, enjoy fresh seafood, and experience the authentic atmosphere of this traditional Mallorcan town.

startLocation.address: Plaça de la Cartoixa, 1, 07170 Valldemossa, Illes Balears, Spain

name: The Chopin & George Sand Tour
summary: Follow in the footsteps of Chopin and George Sand in Valldemossa
description:
Discover the romantic story of Chopin and George Sand in Valldemossa. Visit the Royal Carthusian Monastery where they stayed, see Chopin's piano, and learn about their time in Mallorca.
Experience the charming atmosphere of Valldemossa, enjoy traditional Mallorcan cuisine, and immerse yourself in the island's cultural heritage.
